description: Installation of a new Digital IRS TV/FM Aerial with two satellite dishes and equipment box located on the rear facade of the building. Cables from antennae to the head end and head end to lounge window locations following existing cable routes and locations.
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: The development hereby permitted shall be completed no later than three months from the date of this permission.  In doing so, the existing unlawful antenna, equipment box and cabling located on the north-eastern flank wall of the building (and depicted on plan “Existing Installation”) shall be removed and the wall returned to its original state.

REASON: To ensure the works are implemented in an prompt manner and to improve the visual amenity of the building and street scene and in accordance with policy CS9 (Enhancing Islington’s character) of the Islington Core Strategy 2011, policies D4 (Designing in context) and D11 (Alterations and extensions) of the Islington Unitary Development Plan 2002, the Islington Urban Design Guide 2006 and the Canonbury Conservation Area Design Guidelines.
